title: Tech watchdog calls on Facebook Oversight Board members to demand real power or resign
text: A new policy-focused nonprofit that emerged from the recent wave of big tech scrutiny is calling for members of Facebook’s Oversight Board to either step up or step down. In an open letter, Accountable Tech urges the five U.S.

title: Facebook stock raised to $305 record high: Credit Suisse
text: Yahoo Finance's Seana Smith, Myles Udland and Dan Roberts weigh in on Facebook stock raised to record high despite advertising boycott.

title: Zuckerberg says there’s ‘no deal of any kind’ between Facebook and Trump
text: In an interview with Axios, Mark Zuckerberg shot down suspicions that Facebook is giving President Trump lenient treatment on the platform as part of a closed-door agreement. “I’ve heard this speculation, too, so let me be clear: There’s no deal of any kind,” Zuckerberg told Axios.

title: Brazil will authorize payments system involving WhatsApp if rules are respected, central bank director says
text: Brazil's central bank will authorize a payments system involving Facebook Inc's WhatsApp messaging service, to send money and make payments via chats, as long as all rules are respected, director Joao Manoel Pinho de Mello said on Monday.

title: TikTok Ban Speculation Is Good News For Facebook, Google
text: Social media app TikTok has been one of the biggest winners of the shelter-in-place environment in 2019.

title: Factbox: More companies join Facebook ad boycott bandwagon
text: A long list of companies have pulled advertising from Facebook Inc in support of a campaign that called out the social media giant for not doing enough to stop hate speech on its platforms.

title: Global Launch of Instagram Reels Makes Facebook a Buy
text: Remember how big of a success Instagram Stories was? Instagram Reels will be an equally huge success.

title: Zuckerberg tells Axios that Facebook doesn't have a secret deal with President Trump
text: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg is denying he has a secret understanding with Trump when it comes to the president's Facebook posts.

title: Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg says there's no secret deal with Trump
text: The social network CEO tells Axios that rumors of a secret understanding with the president are "pretty ridiculous."

title: 'Hopefully Facebook will now get the wake-up call'—Entrepreneur Steve Case on ad boycott
text: Disney is the latest company to slash its advertising spending on Facebook as civil rights organizations call for a boycott of the social media company over its content moderation policies.
